qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital and Yorkshire General Hospital, what are the ages of patients T. Jackson and I. Chavez?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, patient T. Jackson is 95 years old; according to the hospitalization records of Yorkshire General Hospital, patient I. Chavez is 82 years old.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital and Yorkshire General Hospital, what is the marital status of patients T. Jackson and I. Chavez?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, patient T. Jackson is widowed; according to the hospitalization records of Yorkshire General Hospital, patient I. Chavez is also widowed.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital and Yorkshire General Hospital, what are the chief complaints of patients T. Jackson and I. Chavez?

content: Persistent low mood, loss of interest in daily activities for the past 6 months.
Intermittent upper abdominal pain, acid reflux, and heartburn for 2 months.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, patient T. Jackson's chief complaint is persistent low mood and loss of interest in daily activities for the past 6 months; according to the hospitalization records of Yorkshire General Hospital, patient I. Chavez's chief complaint is intermittent upper abdominal pain, acid reflux, and heartburn for 2 months.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital and Yorkshire General Hospital, what are the preliminary diagnoses for patients T. Jackson and I. Chavez?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, patient T. Jackson's preliminary diagnosis is Major Depressive Disorder; according to the hospitalization records of Yorkshire General Hospital, patient I. Chavez's preliminary diagnosis is Peptic Ulcer.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital and Yorkshire General Hospital, what are the occupations of patients T. Jackson and I. Chavez?

content: Occupation and Working Conditions: Retired engineer, previously worked in office settings.
Retired teacher, no known work-related health issues.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, patient T. Jackson is a retired engineer; according to the hospitalization records of Yorkshire General Hospital, patient I. Chavez is a retired teacher.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital and Yorkshire General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, T. Jackson or I. Chavez?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: T. Jackson was admitted on July 11, and I. Chavez was admitted on February 12. I. Chavez was admitted earlier.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital and Yorkshire General Hospital, who is older, T. Jackson or I. Chavez?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: T. Jackson is 95 years old, and I. Chavez is 82 years old. T. Jackson is older.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital and Yorkshire General Hospital, whose blood pressure is higher, T. Jackson or I. Chavez?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: T. Jackson's blood pressure is 130/80 mmHg, and I. Chavez's blood pressure is 135/80 mmHg. I. Chavez's blood pressure is higher.
